product_name: INNO Tire Hold Rooftop Bike Mount
long_description: Loading your bike onto the INNO Tire Hold Rooftop Bike Mount couldn't be easier or faster. Simply set the bike in the rack, secure with the ratcheting arms and cable lock, and go. Ratcheting arms open wide, allowing you to easily set the bike on the rack; then place the arms over wheels for a secure hold. Fits 20 - 29 in. wheels up to 2.7 in. wide. Universal mounting hardware mounts to square, round and most factory crossbars. Includes keys and locks and a locking bike cable; rear ratchet tire holder locks to keep bike secure.
short_description: Loading your bike onto the INNO Tire Hold Rooftop Bike Mount couldn't be easier or faster. Simply set the bike in the rack, secure with the ratcheting arms and cable lock, and go.
